text: @realDonaldTrump You’re a liar Fat Boy, and your lies are costing people their lives. You are going to lose in a landslide of epic proportions come November. And then you and your criminal children will be hauled off to jail. #TrumpVirus #TrumpVirusTestingFailure #coronavirus #ImpeachedForever

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
